name: Ashik
comment: While I made my decision to buy a Nissan Bluebird, everyone broke upon me saying it’s gonna be the worst decision in my life. But Alhamdulillah finally I never regret my decision.

name: Tapushi Nilu
comment: As a second hand car initial maintenance cost may go very high; because you may need to replace the whole engine and gear box if the car is converted to CNG earlier. CNG conversion will definitely damage this engine today or tomorrow.

name: MD Redowan
comment: 9-10 kmpl for octane. And 8-9 kmpl for LPG (presently I’m running with that for last 1.5 years.) This is highway mileage. Fuel consumption is higher than Toyota. In this segment only a Suzuki can beat Toyota.

name: MD Armaan
comment: Leg room/ head room can be compared with an old Alion/ Premio. But regarding comfort Bluebird will easily beat an Alion/ Premio. I’m 6’4” tall person, and inner space was the main factor for me to take decision.

name: MD Shehab
comment: It’s your car, so you have to make your own choice. Rather than depending on public opinion. But one thing is for sure; if you want to buy any car other that Toyota then you have to be very very confident on that car and you have to lover that car. Otherwise; all the people around you will puzzle you e.g.

name: MD Usman
comment: In Bangladesh if you want to buy any car other than Toyota; then biggest challenge is this part. You can’t take your car anywhere/ any garage. It won’t work actually. You have to choose your workshop very very carefully.

name: MD Rakib
comment: I-Works (For me Saiful Vai is the best), SpeedCare, Uttara; Vehicle Solution, Bashudhara; Multibrand, Tejgaon; Car Doctor, Kallyanpur; etc… Beside I know some Car Technician personally who are very good at maintaining non-toyota cars.

name: MD Armaan
comment: Delicate maintenance is required for cars other than Toyota. Like for Toyota if you use non-genuine parts the car will not deny it. But for other cars, you must use everything 100000% genuine parts. Even the engine coolant.

name: MD Ashik
comment: Means suppose your spark plug is making trouble, work-shop mistry are telling you that it may run another 1000-2000 km. For Toyota you may take that chances; but for non-toyota cars in BD you can never take that chances. If your car breaks down on road specially on highway then there will be no one to help you out.

name: MD Noman
comment: Every spares are available at ready stock in Bangladesh. Ranging from brand new one to the used (reconditioned) spares at Dholaikhal market. You will never regret finding spares..

name: MD Kaman
comment: The 2021 event featured 100 collector cars from around the country. The next Las Vegas Concours will be held Oct. 22, 2022.

name: MD Molla
comment: It’s your car, so you have to make your own choice. Rather than depending on public opinion. But one thing is for sure; if you want to buy any car other that Toyota then you have to be very very confident on that car and you have to lover that car.
